original_title: Ukrainian arrested in Italy over Nord Stream sabotage – German prosecutors — RT World News
article_summary: "UK Ambassador to US urges flexibility from Zelensky in peace talks with Russia, suggesting security guarantees could help ease domestic opposition. Trump also calls for Zelensky to show flexibility and plans a Putin-Zelensky summit. Meanwhile, the US plan to build a naval drone fleet faces technical issues and management turmoil, according to Reuters."</s>
